issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: Alloy items that will be included in CLI 7.1.0
fixVersions.name: CLI Release 7.1.0

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When using the {{<View>}} tag in {{<AlertDialog}} on iOS, a warning is thrown, also the platform is set to Android.
fields.summary: iOS: Warning message thrown when using <View> in <AlertDialog> (Android-only)

comments.body:
Verified the fix on Cli 7.1.0-master.22 with alloy 1.14.0-1. No warning message shown on IOS  when using <View> in <AlertDialog> and getting warning message *"Additional views in <AlertDialog> (line 7) are only supported on Android
[WARN] :   To get rid of this warning, add platform="android" to your child elements"* when I dint include platform ="android".Works as expected.closing
Test Environment:
{code}
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.13.6
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 8
  Memory                      = 17179869184
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 10.13.0
  npm Version                 = 6.4.1
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.2.1
Alloy version=1.14.0-1
Cli =7.1.0-master.22
Titanium SDK =8.2.0.v20190619100154
Device =iPhone 6s plus iOS 12, 
Simulator =iphone XR iOS 12
{code}
